Related Character(s): 孛, 邑
Связанный символ (и): 孛, да

郣字的基本解释

郣
bó
〔郣海〕中国汉代郡名。亦作“渤海”。
平地上隆起的部分。

郣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》蒲没切，入没，並。］
地名用字。

郣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　郣； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1272第09
【唐韻】蒲没切【集韻】薄没切，?音勃。【說文】郣海，地名。　又地之起者曰郣。　又【正字通】通作渤。渤澥，海名。《前漢·武帝紀》作㪍海，《封禪書》作㴾海，《揚雄傳》作勃解，皆轉寫之譌耳。　又叶皮列切，音別。【鮑昭·樂府】築山擬蓬壷，穿池類溟郣。選色徧齊代，徵聲匝邛越。

郣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
郣字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Abundance
bó
〔胣海〕The name of a prefecture in the Han Dynasty in China. Also known as "Bohai".
The raised part on flat ground.

Place names in words.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Jixia】【Yi Zi Department】　郣; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1272 Page 09
[Tang Yun] Pu did not cut [Ji Yun] Thin but not cut,? Yin Bo. [Said Wen] Dehai, the name of the place.　The one who rises again from the earth is called 郣.　[Zhengzitong] It is the same as Bo. Bo Xi, the name of the sea. "The Records of Emperor Wu of the Former Han Dynasty" was written as 㪍海, "The Book of Feng Chan" was written as 㴾海, and "The Story of Yang Xiong" was written as Bo's interpretation, both of which were transcribed as Chiao.　 Ye Piliche again, Ombetsu. [Bao Zhao·Yuefu] The mountain is built like a pontoon, and the pond is like a pond. Choose colors all over the Qi Dynasty, Zheng Sheng Zaqiong Yue.
